entities.name: frank
entities.description: The narrator of the story who is listening to a conversation through a door.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A man who is part of a group and is asking Lord Voldemort about their stay.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The cold voice that is being heard through the door. He is also known as My Lord.

entities.name: quidditch world cup
entities.description: A sports event that is mentioned as a reason for delaying their plan.

relationships.description: Lord Voldemort speaks to Wormtail through the door.
Frank mishears the word 'Quidditch' as something else.
Wormtail asks a question to Lord Voldemort about their stay.
Lord Voldemort uses the Quidditch World Cup as a reason for delaying their plan.
